name.baseName: Gas Purification ; Coal gas ; Coal ; Coal retorting ; All sizes; NESPS2
煤气净化 ; 煤制气 ; 煤炭 ; 煤炭干馏 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisAerobic biological treatment + physical chemical treatment (coagulation and precipitation)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management97

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisAerobic biological treatment + physical chemical treatment (coagulation and precipitation)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management97
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所述工业过程涉及通过煤炭干馏的煤气净化和煤气生产，适用于所有规模的操作。用于污染控制的末端处理技术包括好氧生物处理和物理化学处理（混凝和沉淀）。这些技术特别用于煤气净化和煤炭生产行业中的氰化物、化学需氧量、苯酚、石油相关废物、废水和氨氮等污染物的处理。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码45,四级代码4513文件，在完整版文件中第2495页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution cyanideisAerobic biological treatment + physical chemical treatment (coagulation and precipitation)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management90
污染物指标氰化物的末端治理技术是好氧生物处理法+物理化学处理法（混凝沉淀），其效率为90，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水处理设施DCS年运行时间（小时）/正常生产时间（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氰化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
源文件中描述为为煤制气，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisAerobic biological treatment + physical chemical treatment (coagulation and precipitation)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management93
